full_summary:
### Aircraft Parts for the Challenger CL650 Fleet
===============

**Tender Reference:** WS4314383696
**Posting Date:** November 24, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 22, 2023, 14:00 EST

**Contract Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPWGS) is seeking a qualified vendor to supply aircraft parts for the Challenger CL650 fleet. The tender includes the requirement to acquire digital altitude control systems (UNSPSC 25201601) for Transport Canada (TC), the Air Services Directorate (ASD).

**Requirements:**

Interested vendors must be a qualified Supply Arrangement holder under the PSPC/SUA-17 program. Vendors are required to submit a bid package that includes all necessary supporting documentation and must be received by December 22, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

**Important Considerations:**

* Bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.
* Vendors must meet the requirements outlined in the Annex A - Requirement Quotation section.
* The tender will be issued using the CanadaBuys standard instructions and general conditions.

**Contact Information:**

Inquiries and procurements information can be obtained from:

Valerie Bourassa (SPAC/PSPC)
valerie.bourassa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Details:**

* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPWGS) is a contract entity located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.
* The end-user entity is the Department of Transport (TC) with a address of 330 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0N8, Canada.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the terms of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Category:**

This tender is classified under the Goods and Services category of procurement. The selection criteria for this tender is the Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas).
